article_title: In King v. Burwell, Scalia Exposed Executive-Judicial Collusion Against Congress, Voters & The Law

article_metadata.description: Scalia's dissent in King v. Burwell exposed that, rather than give effect to Congress' intent, the majority simply substituted its own policy preferences for those of Congress.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
